alert.note: Alert for Fairfield; Lexington; Richland (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 6:13PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Fairfield, north central Lexington and northwestern Richland Counties through 700 PM EDT... At 612 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Ballentine, or near Irmo, moving east at 5 mph. ...Boaters on Lake Murray Should Seek Safe Harbor... HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and torrential rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Ponding on roadways is expected. Locations impacted include... Lexington, Irmo, Highway 6 at Lake Murray Dam, Oak Grove, St. Andrews, Ballentine, Harbison State Forest, Chapin, Seven Oaks, Lighthouse Marina, Lake Murray Marina, Bundrick Island, Putnam`s Landing, White Rock, Rocky Point Recreation Area, Upper Richland Fire Station, Pine Island and Melvin Park. This includes the following highways... Interstate 20 in South Carolina between mile markers 57 and 61. Interstate 26 between mile markers 90 and 105. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
